column1: #text=Today I decided I wanted to do something special and plant a tree in my back yard .
#text=I went to the gardening supply store and bought everything I needed to make this happen .
#text=I purchased a shovel , some work gloves , and a small potted tree .
#text=When I got back home I quickly went to my backyard to find the perfect spot for the tree .
#text=After picking out the spot , I put on my new work gloves to protect my hands .
#text=Then I got down on my knees , grabbed the small shovel , and started digging a deep enough hole .
#text=When I was satisfied with the depth of the hole I removed the small tree from the pot and placed it into the hole .
#text=I then covered up the hole with the dirt and made sure it was secure and safe .
#text=When I was finished securing it , I watered the surrounding area of the tree and admired my handy work .
